item.title: Anna Paulina Luna’s ‘Pro Family’ Proxy Push Rings Hollow After She Avoided Florida’s 2024 Abortion Battle
item.description: When it came to standing against the anti-family abortion amendment in her own state last year, Luna was largely absent from the fight.

item.title: If You’re Hysterical About Trump’s Tariffs, Go Touch Grass
item.description: If toting a fainting couch around with you is your thing, fine. But there’s really no need to live this way.

item.title: Michigan Secretary Of State Discovers 15 Possible Noncitizen Voters, Insists It’s No Big Deal
item.description: Michigan Secretary of State Jocelyn Benson claims noncitizen voting is "very rare," despite permissive practices enabling it in the past.

item.title: How God Won Me Over After My Dad Abandoned Me
item.description: My life changed when I learned I wasn’t alone and never will be.

item.title: NY Democrats Seek To Punish Musk Over His Politics
item.description: A Democrat member of the state legislature has introduced a bill avowedly aimed at punishing Elon Musk for his political activities.
